content.rendered: January 10, 2018 – It has come to our attention that inspected slaughter and processing has been temporarily disrupted at Allegheny Meats. We wish them well in quickly overcoming their current obstacles. We are all part of the Virginia farming community, and understand that this may cause some temporary but serious inconvenience for local farmers who have processing scheduled. We are not looking to profit from others misfortune, but we do have some capacity to assist farmers needing immediate processing services. Feel free to contact us. Having said that, we do hope Allegheny is up and running as normal in very near future.
